description:
Paul Wagner, Samuel O'Toole, James Jamesson & Tyler Ford were spotted playing a game of catch this last weekend.

It's hard to say which one is the best looking because they're all so damn hot. Tones muscles, sexy faces and fat cocks. What's not to love!?

When the heat of the sun was too much for the 4, it was time to head indoors. Once inside, the 4 strip down and get ready for shower time. But before they all rinsed off, they decided to get a bit more dirty.

Enjoy!
title: Pitchers & Catchers
